channel.title: Azaruth - 317 [Multiple Worlds]
channel.description:
[center][table] [tr] [td] |Homepage[/td][td] | [/td] [td][img]http://azaruth.com/images/hiscores.png[/img][url=http://azaruth.com/hiscores]Hiscores[/td][td] | [/td] [td][img]http://azaruth.com/images/register.png[/img][url=http://azaruth.com/wp-login.php?action=register]Register[/td][td] | [/td] [td][img]http://azaruth.com/images/downloads.png[/img][url=http://azaruth.com/play-now]Play Now[/td][td] | [/td] [/tr] [/table][/center]
[size=14pt]Allow me to introduce you to Azaruth, a unique private server that falls somewhere between half-assed servers made by 12 year olds and full-blown RS emulations...At a glance Azaruth would seem like your average private server, but we have some things that set us apart from other servers. We have a wonderful website that is completely integrated with our game server. Our game server hosts two worlds, one PvP based and the other one economically based. So... What exactly do we have to offer you?[/size] [size=6pt]Azaruth is a hobby of mine, I'm a full time college student studying computer programming and this server does [u]not[/u] reflect my programming capabilities. Its intended to be a fun server with a nostalgic feel with some new things thrown in. It is a PI based server with modifications by myself and a friend.[/size]
[ul][li]Customized minigames such as Fun PK and Penguin Hide & Seek[/li] [li]23 trainable skills and a special reward for those who achieve maximum total level[/li] [li]A wide variety of shops to purchase everything that's not made by players or dropped by monsters[/li] [li]Cute adorable awesome pets! Most servers don't bother with pets, but we have both pets and summoning familiars[/li] [li]A plethora of places to train, you can go just about anywhere and level up some skill[/li] [li]Little economy boosters such as voting for gold ever hour[/li] [li]Special shops to redeem Slayer Points, Penguin Points, and PK Points[/li] [li]Player owned shops, if you want to sell something you can always throw it into your shop[/li] [li]... and much more.[/li][/ul]
[u][b]A few pictures:[/b][/u]
[table] [tr] [td][b]Penguin Hide & Seek Minigame[/b][/td][td][b]Our Usual Advertisement Picture[/b][/td] [/tr] [tr][td][img]http://azaruth.com/images/penguin.png[/img][/td][td][url=http://azaruth.com/][img width=600]http://azaruth.com/images/azaruth.png[/img][/td][/tr] [/table] [table] [tr] [td][b]Summoning & My Pet Hypnotoad[/b][/td][td][b]Kalphite Queen[/b][/td] [/tr] [tr] [td][img]http://azaruth.com/images/Untitled13.png[/img][/td][td][img]http://azaruth.com/images/Untitled1.png[/img][/td][td][/td] [/tr] [/table] [table] [tr] [td][b]Tormented Deamons[/b][/td][td][b]Corporeal Beast[/b][/td] [/tr] [tr] [td][img]http://azaruth.com/images/Untitled2.png[/img][/td][td][img]http://azaruth.com/images/Untitled3.png[/img][/td][td][/td] [/tr] [/table]
[u][b][size=16pt]We've remodeled Azaruth for 2013, some of our most recent changes:[/size][/b][/u] [size=14pt][b]January 23rd, 2013[/b][/size] Server Patches:
[ul][li]Global items fixed: [list] [li]Dropped items will remain on the ground for 60 seconds (only visible to you)[/li] [li]After the initial 60 seconds your items become global, meaning they can be seen by anyone and taken by anyone[/li] [li]An additional 60 seconds after that the items are removed from the game[/li] [li]The above applies to items dropped on death as well as items you just drop from your inventory[/li] [li]If you are killed by a player, the items will show for [strong][em]that[/em][/strong] player for 60 seconds, and then become global.[/li] [/list] [/li] [li]Due to its outstanding difficultly, the server will praise you whenever the Corporeal Beast is slain.[/li] [li]Item on object packet handling has been fixed to correctly read the data sent from the client[/li][/ul]
Client Patches:
[ul][li]Graphical fixes for capes[/li] [li]Model position fixes for hats[/li] [li]Enhanced 'Error while loading...' screen[/li][/ul]
[size=14pt][b]January 20th, 2013[/b][/size] Server Patches:
[ul][li]Skeletons are no longer invisible[/li] [li]Slayer shop prices have been modified[/li] [li]Right clicking 'Get task' on Vannaka will now assign you a slayer task[/li] [li]Ancient spells that should hit multiple targets function as intended now[/li] [li]Glitch causing you to lose all items on death has been fixed[/li][/ul]
Misc Patches:
[ul][li]Daily backups will be saved at 0100 Romeo Time to the virtual server[/li][/ul]
[size=14pt][b]January 19th, 2013[/b][/size] Server Patches:
[ul][li]Bandos Avatar: [list] [li]Relocated to the wilderness west of the Ruins[/li] [li]Buffed to hit though protection prayers[/li] [li]Will randomly drop PvP items such as Statius' and Vesta's[/li] [li]Has a chance of dropping Barrows pieces[/li] [/list] [/li] [li]Godwars: [list] [li]All bosses have been buffed to a higher level of difficulty[/li] [li]Drops were adjusted to better reflect the monster you are fighting[/li] [/list] [/li] [li]Kalphite Queen: [list] [li]Her first and second stage forms were given massive buffs[/li] [li]Her drops now include the Zamorak Hilt[/li] [li]Her respawn time was lessened slightly[/li] [/list] [/li] [li]General Drop Changes: [list] [li]Monsters will no longer drop donator only items[/li] [li]Drop rates are no longer randomized and range from 100% drop rate to 0.15% drop rate[/li] [li]Anything that dropped a Zamorak Godsword now drops the hilt instead[/li] [li]The effectiveness of deflect and protect prayers have been reduced slightly[/li] [/list] [/li] [li]Shop Updates: [list] [li]Zamorak Godsword has been removed from all shops[/li] [li]PvP equipment (Statius, Vestas, etc) have been removed and made into monster drops (see above)[/li] [/list] [/li] [li]Misc Server Updates: [list] [li]A magical chest has been added at home to reset combat status, [strong]use with caution![/strong][/li] [li]Voting rewards have been reduced to 5M and 1 Pk Point per hour[/li] [li]Combat exp rates have been reduced to make the game more challenging[/li] [li]Summoning experience has been slashed to 1/3rd of its original amount[/li] [li]Master Cape has been replaced by the Completionist Cape (2277 total level)[/li] [li]Items will drop on death outside of the wilderness now [list] [li]By default you will keep your three most valuable items based on the servers price list[/li] [li]Both item protection prayers/curses work to keep a 4th item[/li] [li]If you are skulled all items will be lost unless a protection prayer is used, one item will be kept[/li] [/list] [/li] [li]Starter logs have been emptied to help new players and bring the economy back to life[/li] [li]Ban logs/Mute logs have been mostly emptied. IP bans and mutes will remain[/li] [li]Blackmark system has been slightly updated to display information upon logging in[/li] [li]The cluster of messages received when logging in have been toned down[/li] [li]The quest tab has new information on it[/li] [li]The bug that prevented login if you had capital letters in your password has been fixed[/li] [/list] [/li][/ul]
Client Patches:
[ul][li]Completionist Cape has been added to the clients cache[/li] [li]Fixed some glitched equipment, still a lot to fix[/li] [li]Fullscreen mode no longer available[/li][/ul]
Website Patches:
[ul][li]The home page has been given a slight visual upgrade[/li] [li]The footer area of home page now contains contact information[/li] [li]Registration changes [list] [li]Modified to prevent names starting with 'Mod'[/li] [li]Usernames cannot exceed twelve characters[/li] [li]Non alphanumeric characters are blocked (-, !, @, #, $, %,^,&,/,{,}, etc)[/li] [li]The 'Register' button was made legible[/li] [li]Tips and errors no longer appear randomly[/li] [/list] [/li] [li]Several plugins and some under the hood stuff were updated[/li] [li]A 'Tip of the Week' has been added to the bottom of most pages[/li] [li]The hiscores have been slightly modified[/li] [li]There are new entries on the FAQ page[/li][/ul]
I can be contacted at the following address for any questions, comments, or concerns: [email]john@azaruth.com[/email]
[size=16pt][url=http://azaruth.com/wp-login.php?action=register]Click Here to Register![/url][/size] [size=8pt]Registration is required to play, but it only takes a moment..[/size]

item.title: Azaruth - 317 [Multiple Worlds]
item.dc:creator: @Quin1 Quin1
item.description:
@Quin1 wrote:

A great server that I have played through the years. It was great staff that are very helpful and they always accept your input into ideas for new content so the players build the server. There is one problem though and that is that there are very few players to help come up with ideas. All that this server needs is players and it can go far. I would highly recommend it to anyone that wants to play a RSPS.

Read full topic
